description:
Melee: Deal 3% additional damage, take 1.5% additional damage.

Ranged: Deal and take 2% additional damage
6121.name: Double Edged Sword

description: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (30 second cooldown)
6122.name: Feast

description: Every 4 seconds in combat, your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 2.5% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)
6261.name: Grasp of the Undying

description: Damaging enemy champions causes them to take 3% more damage from your allies
6123.name: Expose Weakness

description: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed
6141.name: Bounty Hunter

description: Deal 2.5% increased damage to targets with impaired movement (slow, stun, root, taunt, etc.)
6142.name: Oppressor

description:
You generate stacks of Fervor by hitting enemy champions with attacks and abilities. Your basic attacks deal 1-14 bonus physical damage (based on your level) to enemy champions for each of your stacks of Fervor (max 8 stacks).

Damaging enemy champions with an attack generates 1 stack of Fervor (2 for melee champions) and damaging enemy champions with an ability generates 2 stacks of Fervor (2 second cooldown). Stacks of Fervor last 6 seconds.
6162.name: Fervor of Battle

description: Gain increasingly more Life Steal based on your missing health against champions (up to 20%). Against minions gain 50% benefit (25% for ranged champions).
6161.name: Warlord's Bloodlust

description:
Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take additional magic damage equal to 8 + 60% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 25% of your Ability Power, over 4 seconds.

Deathfire Touch has reduced effectiveness when applied by area of effect and damage over time abilities.
- Area of Effect: 2 second duration.
- Damage over time: 1 second duration.
6164.name: Deathfire Touch

description: Deal 2% increased damage to champions when no allied champions are nearby
6323.name: Assassin

description:
Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally.

Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)
6342.name: Bandit

description: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%
6241.name: Insight

description: +50% Base Health Regen, increased to +200% when below 25% Health
6242.name: Perseverance

description: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer
6321.name: Runic Affinity

description:
Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer.

Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 15 Health and Mana instantly on use
6322.name: Secret Stash

description: Siege minions and large monsters that you or nearby allied champions kill grant 20 and 10 permanent Health, respectively (300 max). After reaching the max bonus, these kills instead restore 6% of your Maximum Health.
6262.name: Strength of the Ages

description: +4% Damage Reduction. 6% of the damage from enemy champions taken by the nearest allied champion is dealt to you instead. Damage is not redirected if you are below 5% of your maximum health.
6263.name: Bond of Stone

description: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana
6343.name: Dangerous Game

description: Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 41% and you gain 1% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 42% and you gain 2% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 43% and you gain 3% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 44% and you gain 4% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 45% and you gain 5% Cooldown Reduction

6252.name: Legendary Guardian

description:
Your 3rd attack or damaging spell against the same enemy champion calls down a lightning strike, dealing magic damage in the area.

Damage: 10 per level, plus 30% of your Bonus Attack Damage, and 10% of your Ability Power (25-15 second cooldown, based on level).
6362.name: Thunderlord's Decree

description: +15 Movement Speed in Brush and River
6221.name: Explorer

description: Dealing 30% of a champion's max Health within 2.5 seconds grants you 40% Movement Speed and 75% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown).
6361.name: Stormraider's Surge

description: Your heals and shields are 10% stronger. Additionally, your shields and heals on other allies increase their armor by 5-22 (based on level) and their magic resistance by half that amount for 3 seconds.
6363.name: Windspeaker's Blessing

description: You take 2 less damage from champion and neutral monster basic attacks
6223.name: Tough Skin
